definition: will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])

sentences.english: Then you can pick up the trumps by finessing twice against East.
sentences.chinese: 於是你需要從明手引兩次將牌對抗東。

sentences.english: He finished riffling through the cards and then passed them to the old man.
sentences.chinese: 他將牌洗好，然後遞給那位老人。

sentences.english: Fasten a blue cord to it to attach it to the turban; it is to be on the front of the turban.
sentences.chinese: 要用一條藍細帶子將牌系在冠冕的前面。

sentences.english: In the reshuffle when first trump back upward, then shuffle.
sentences.chinese: 在洗牌時地要先將牌背朝上，然後再洗牌。

sentences.english: He has riffled the cards skilfully.
Practice than retain trump, waiting for an opportunity to play to Hu faster.
sentences.chinese: 實踐中比保留將牌，等待時機的打法要胡得快些。
